## Go slow, go back

-   Make sure everyone can follow along

-   Explain every step

-   Repeat important tasks

## Take a pause

-   Wait until natural breaks to field questions

-   Take dedicated pauses

    -   Answer questions

    -   Allow everyone to catch up
